column5: How is 35W through Duluth and then 61 up to Pigeon River?

Lot's of construction in Duluth from the point coming down the hill to making the turn on 61. Expect a delay, much of it is one lane and narrow. From there to border roads were excellent. We traveled on Sat May 21st and had only a few contruction sites. Nothing compared to Duluth. Roads in Canada from Thunder bay to Savant Lake were in the best shape we have seen in years.
Thanks. Kinda what I expected to hear. And I agree about the roads from Pigeon River to Savant Lake. Hardly took my foot off the gas last year.
